header.title: Italy
header.intro: In the summer of August 2018, my closest friends from high school and I embarked on an unforgettable journey to Italy. Our tight-knit group, known as 5k, set out on a 15-day adventure, exploring the stunning city of Venice, basking in the beauty of Lake Garda, and discovering numerous other incredible destinations. With the freedom of having a car, we were able to fully immerse ourselves in the versatility and magic of Italy. Together, we created memories that will forever be cherished.

image.alt: Together with my friends in Italy
